s1.title: Skin Look and Feel Decorator
s1.p: A theme for Skin look and feel

The Skin Look and Feel for Swing has been adapted to become a pluggable decorator. The control panel for the decorator allows a number of configurations for appearance. These are the skins that are listed on the main Skin Look and Feel site - mac, windows, beos, mozilla.
There is still plenty to do for Oyoaha:

ol.li: Use Radio buttons in the configration tool, rather than check boxes
